data.name: Template
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal in_format}}
    <setBody>
        {{#if (eq format "json")}}
        <simple trim="false">
<![CDATA[{{safe code_json}}]]>
        </simple>
        {{/if}}
        {{#if (eq format "xml")}}
        <simple trim="false">
<![CDATA[{{safe code_xml}}]]>
        </simple>
        {{/if}}
    </setBody>
    <multicast>
        {{#each target}}
        <to uri="direct:{{this}}"/>
        {{/each}}
    </multicast>
    {{applyMarshal out_format}}
</route>
